Detailed Description

Abstract base interfaces,.

common functions/utils/data members and other API for the specific debug command class'es to derive from it

Definition at line 1391 of file bp_interconnect.h.

Member Function Documentation

virtual exec_status Bp::BpInterconnect::BpCommandBase::Execute ( bp_output_cb_t *  outputCb,
uvm_ml_time_unit  timeUnit,
double  timeValue 
) [pure virtual]

interface of the method to either broadcast the command to all the frameworks (for internal commands) or to execute it directly (for internal commands)

Parameters:
frameworkId - the framework the command was originated from (-1 - interactively)
command_with_arguments - full command-line (without uvm_ml(_) prefix)
outputCb - additional stream to print output to
timeUnit - current simulation time units enum (TIME_UNIT_UNDEFINED if the framework does not have an ability to advance time)
timeValue - numeric value of current simulation time scaled according to timeUnit
Returns:
UVM_ML_COMMAND_SUCCESS - UVM_ML_COMMAND_FAILURE - UVM_ML_UNRECOGNIZED_COMMAND -

Implemented in Bp::BpInterconnect::BpPredefinedCommand, Bp::BpInterconnect::BpInternalCommand, Bp::BpInterconnect::BpExternalCommand, Bp::BpInterconnect::BpCommandPrintTree, Bp::BpInterconnect::BpCommandPrintConnections, Bp::BpInterconnect::BpCommandPhase, Bp::BpInterconnect::BpCommandTraceRegister, and Bp::BpInterconnect::BpCustomCommand.

Referenced by Bp::BpInterconnect::BpDebugClass::ExecuteCommand().
